name: FileStreamBot
description: A Telegram Bot to Stream Movies and Series directly via FilmBee.

ENV.description: Set this to True if you don't want to crash the bot

API_SECRET.description: A secure secret key for accessing the API endpoints. (Generate a random string). If its empty then api is disabled.

FLOG_CHANNEL.description: ID of Channel Where store files sent by users.

ULOG_CHANNEL.description: ID of Channel Where store New Users data.

OWNER_ID.description: Your Telegram User ID as Owner

DATABASE_URL.description: MongoDB URI for saving User Data and Files List created by user.

AUTH_USERS.description: Put IDs of Auth Users where bot will work. You can add multiple IDs & separate with Space.

PRIVATE_MODE.description: Set to True to restrict bot to Allowed Groups only. Set False for Public access.

ALLOWED_GROUPS.description: Space separated IDs of Channels/Groups allowed in Private Mode (e.g., -100123456 -100987654)

UPDATES_CHANNEL.description: Channel Username without `@` to set channel as Update Channel

FORCE_SUB_ID.description: Channel ID starts with -100 to set channel as Force Sub Channel

FORCE_SUB.description: Set to True, so every user have to Join update channel to use the bot.

SLEEP_THRESHOLD.description: Set global flood wait threshold, auto-retry requests under 60s.

WORKERS.description: No. of workers that is to be assigned.

PORT.description: The port that you want your webapp to be listened to

NO_PORT.description: If you don't want your port to be displayed. Set True or False

HAS_SSL.description: (can be either True or False) If you want the generated links in https format.

BIND_ADDRESS.description: Your server bind address. default to 0.0.0.0

FQDN.description: Heroku app Link without http/s://, you can set later. its required

SESSION_NAME.description: Name for the Database created on your MongoDB. Defaults to FileStream

FILE_PIC.description: To set Image at /files command. Defaults to pre-set image.

START_PIC.description: To set Image at /start command. Defaults to pre-set image.

VERIFY_PIC.description: To set Image at Force Subscribe Verify. Defaults to pre-set image.

MODE.description: Should be set to `secondary` if you only want to use the server for serving files.
